directions: Prepare Italian salad dressing according to instructions.
In a salad bowl, combine 1/2 cup of the Italian salad dressing, green beans, lima beans, green onions and pimentos. Refrigerate over night. Serve chilled over shredded lettuce.
ingredients: 1 (.7 ounce) package dry Italian-style salad dressing mix
1 (16 ounce) package frozen lima beans, thawed
1 head iceberg lettuce - rinsed, dried, and shredded
title: Holiday Bean Salad
